name: Gun Gladiator
description:
Fight through 10 rounds in one go with increasing difficulty. Replenish your ammo by reflecting enemy bullets. When an enemy is on the edge of health, dash through them to get a health boost. Beat the final boss to win!

A run of this game takes about 7-9 minutes, however there's a good chance you will die once or twice

Controls:

  • Mouse + Keyboard
    • WASD to move
    • Mouse to Aim
    • Left Click to shoot
    • Right Click to dash
    • Spacebar to reflect
    • Spacebar to pick weapon
  • Controller
    • Left Stick to move
    • Right Stick to aim
    • R2 to shoot
    • R1 to dash
    • L1 reflect
    • L1 to select
    • disclaimer: menu can only use mouse i forgot to add sory :(

I didn't make any of the music and all of the sound effects come from free sound. You can find the music tracks on open game art:

  • "Fight them until we can't" by Zander Noriega.
    • https://opengameart.org/content/fight-them-until-we-cant
  • "Forest Ambience" by TinyWorlds.
    • https://opengameart.org/content/forest-ambience
  • "Crowd Ambience" by StarNinjas.
    • https://opengameart.org/content/crowd-shoutingspeaking-ambience
